Path Forward
Path Forward

SME working groups are created to address the 8 security topical areas and update competencies in current DOE-STD-1171-2003
SME working groups are created
to address the 8 security topical
areas and update competencies in
current DOE-STD-1171-2003

Working Groups conduct Gap Analysis between DOE-STD- 1171-2003 and current DOE security program manual requirements to create updated standards
Working Groups conduct Gap
Analysis between DOE-STD-
1171-2003 and current DOE
security program manual
requirements to create updated
standards

supporting knowledge and skills to
fulfill competencies at appropriate
levels (familiarity, working,
expert)

Basic Assumptions
Basic Assumptions

• Standards are applicable to DOE Federal employees only.
• Standards are applicable to DOE Federal employees only. • S t a n d a r d s

• All Security Professionals required to meet General Technical Base
• All Security Professionals required to meet General Technical Base • A l l

through CBT or formal training at the NTC.
through CBT or formal training at the NTC.

Experienced individuals in current positions who have met site specific program requirements will be considered qualified for a designated period of time before the additional FAQS are required to be met.
Experienced individuals in current positions who have met site specific
program requirements will be considered qualified for a designated
period of time before the additional FAQS are required to be met.

Personnel will be required to re-qualify on a periodicity not to exceed 5 years including, as a minimum, items added since the individual’s last qualification or re-qualification.
Personnel will be required to re-qualify on a periodicity not to exceed 5
years including, as a minimum, items added since the individual’s last
qualification or re-qualification.

• Method of confirmation of qualification will include: written exam, oral exam, facility walk through, oral board, demonstration of ability, equivalent level experience, or a combination of evaluation methods.
• Method of confirmation of qualification will include: written exam, oral • M e t h o d

• Goals for completion of individual training requirements will be: 18 months (familiarity level); 30 months (working level); and 48 months (expert level).
